summary: GASOLINE FUEL FIRE -     BURNED THE REAR HALF OF A 1999 DODGE VIPER GTS COUPE          ( TOTALLED ), 15000 MILES, MINT CONDITION.  GAS PUMP AUTO SHUT OFF DID NOT FUNCTION ( PER FIRE MARSHALL'S REPORT)  TOLD PEI ABOUT IT.  CAR WAS OFF, NOT CAR DEFECT.  HOT EXHAUST BELOW FUEL  FILL DOOR ON VIPER RIGHT SIDE.  ASHLAND VIRGINIA TEXACO STATION.
